class.name: LuaObject
class.brief_description: Base class for all Lua objects in GDScript, except LuaState.
class.description:
The LuaObject class provides methods to access the associated Lua state and retrieve object pointers.
This class serves as the foundation for interacting with Lua objects from GDScript. It allows you to: - Get the Lua state associated with the object - Retrieve the pointer value of the Lua object
Note: This is an abstract base class and should not be instantiated directly.

method.name: get_lua_state
method.description:
Returns the LuaState associated with this Lua object.
This method provides access to the Lua state that manages this object, allowing you to perform Lua operations.

method.name: get_pointer_value
method.description:
Returns the pointer value of the Lua object as an integer.
This value represents the memory address of the underlying Lua object and can be used for identification or debugging purposes.
